description: Concatenation of first n Bell numbers (A000108).
references: Amarnath Murthy, Generalization of Partition function, introducing Smarandache Factor partition, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 11, No. 1-2-3, Spring 2000.
Amarnath Murthy, A general result on the Smarandache Star function, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 11, No. 1-2-3, Spring 2000.
Amarnath Murthy, Properties of Smarandache Star Triangle, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 11, No. 1-2-3, Spring 2000.
example: a(5) = 1251552, since 1, 2, 5, 15, 52 are the first five bell numbers.
maple: with(combinat, bell): for n from 1 to 20 do for k from 1 to n do printf(`%d`, bell(k)) od: printf(`,`): od:
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 21 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Apr 23 2001
